# Edward Alkśnin

| birth_place    = Grodno, Byelorussian SSR, Soviet Union
| death_date     =
| death_place    =
}}
Edward Alkśnin (born 2 October 1954) is a Polish judoka. He competed in the men's lightweight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics.
